Episode 12 - You feeling lucky, squid? \/ Quite the squidicament we're in. \/ An even worse squidicament!
Episode 11 - I ink that's a doll? \/ Isn't that fishy? \/ Squids to match my mountains.
Episode 10 - Isn't that a Teru Teru bosquid? \/ What squidsn't there to like? \/ One! Two! Three squids, you're out!
Episode 9 - Wanna doorbell ditch, squiddo? \/ Can squids put on make-up? \/ Holy squid! Is that a secret weapon?
Episode 8 - Aren't you a squiddle under the weather? \/ Ink that a new ability? \/ Squidn't you bring an umbrella?
Episode 7 - Focus your tentacles on her! \/ Feeling inkuisitive? \/ A squiddle work never killed anyone.
Episode 6 - Up for an inkredible Hero Stage Show? \/ Squidn't you be studying right now? \/ Is this inkfatuation or love?
Episode 5 - Not from this sea, are you? \/ Why not join the school of fish? \/ Wouldn't having a pet be squidtastic?
